text:
Hi All, I hope you are well - I have recently had an opportunity become available for a Senior RStudio Administrator to work fully remotely from the US. Do you know anyone who would be suitable? Thanks!

Job Description:
We’re seeking an experienced R Studio Administrator to join our client support team, dedicated to maintaining and optimizing a robust R Studio environment that supports hundreds of data scientists. This role is an essential support position ensuring smooth operations and resolving ticketed issues as they arise.

Key Responsibilities:
• Administer R Studio Environment: Manage installation, configuration, troubleshooting, patching, and upgrades of RStudio Workbench, Connect, and Package Manager.
• Build & Deploy R Packages: Oversee installation, upgrades, and patching processes, adhering to change management protocols.
• Quarterly Maintenance: Manage R bundle upgrades and quarterly rebuilds as part of the release cycle.
• Collaborate with IT teams to ensure seamless service delivery.
Thanks!
